[`Command`](Command) â€º [`callback`](Command/callback)

## Command.callback property

Simple callback, triggered globally.

**Signature:**

```typescript
callback?: () => any;
```

## Example


```ts
this.addCommand({
  id: "print-greeting-to-console",
  name: "Print greeting to console",
  callback: () => {
    console.log("Hey, you!");
  },
});
```
